name: ReX
description:
REX it's a Roguelike/Shoot'em'up/Melee game with infinite gameplay and a variety of features and builds. You will control Rex, an alcoholic cat with a weak memory but a noble mission: to save the world from the evil Draconians.

You will fight against them in different scenarios with various builds, powers, and magic. Each round, the enemies become stronger and appear in greater numbers, but you will also become stronger.

You and Rex are the world's last hope, so create a powerful build, climb the leaderboard, and save the world in this beautiful steampunk magic fantasy.



  • 3 different scenarios
  • Melee mechanics
  • Roguelike Deckbuilder mechanics
  • Steampunk Theme
  • 1 boss every 20 levels
  • A leaderboard system, with world, national and local ranks.
